Description: Calculate the edit distance between two words and then use edgework to solve the module. Tags: words, matrix, three-display, number-pad, del, clr, sub
Name: Levenshtein Distance

Souvenir.Explanation:
Souvenir could ask for the words displayed in the top two displays or the answer.

For example:
1) What was the word on the top display of Levenshtein Distance?
2) What was the word on the middle display of Levenshtein Distance?
3) What was the asnwer in Levenshtein Distance?

Notes:
The words disappear after the module is solved.
The answer never changes with time or strike but is dependant on the input words.
The module has only one stage.
